attributes.action: Stop all Goverment Funding to Islamic Education Groups that allow the Preaching of Extremist Islamic Views
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop any Goverment Funding to Islamic Education Groups that allow the preaching of Extremist Views that may insite racial tention within local Communities. Also use exsisting Laws to prosecute those responsible for Preaching such Views.
